title: PBE Issue
body:
I signed up for the PBE but no IP or Essences? 

Riot Please

replies.body: Check out our recent [PBE post](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-within-1-hour-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence) on this!  Currency on PBE will refresh with a stipend around noon pacific time each day!

I know store is closed, but my dear idiot, try go to store and buy something and then see if you are 0 or not.

I mean that it says 0 because there is so many numbers that is on RP and BE, so it says 0, but after you buy something, it goes down and then 999999 rp, np idiot
It'll take up to an hour for you to recieve the automatic rp and essence. just restart after you think you've waited long enough.
